topics.body:
(David Attenborough voice)
Here we see our native derpibooru members during their slumber cycle.  Derpibooru members are well known for their liking of drawings of ponies as well as having plushie pillows while sleeping.  Your daytime derpibooru members are different from your night dwelling kind in that the daytime members of the group have sensible sleep schedules and go to bed at normal times.
